name: SHREE MATESHWARI VIKAS SEWA SAMITI

address: Shree Mateshwari Vikas Sewa Samiti - village and post sallada,

briefDescription: Shri Mateshwari Vikas Seva Samiti is a voluntary organization, established in 2001, as a Social Society by Shri Pema Ram Patel, a social worker with graduate farmer worked closely with the villagers around the Sallada village of Sarada Block of Udaipur district. He established the Organization to improve the economic status of the poor family's lives in rural area. Although various Development Departments of the Government have been trying to help the rural families to provide essential support services, there is a wide gap in the extension services to help the needy families.
